review: the best ninja gaiden beside the og so far

damn good platformer with perfect 90s vibes the soundtrack has rock music that uses a shamisen it begs to get speedruns as you feel like the coolest ninja doing acrobatics through demons right now this game has a ton of glaring bugs its not too surprising because blasphemous 12 were in the same state at launch but its still very upsetting  when you finish the game you unlock hard mode and that mode gives a whole lot more than you expect the real ninja gaiden starts there
the mechanics and fluidity are unmatched as well as the story is very intriguing
incredibly fun and fastpaced challenging but not absurdly so complete with beautiful pixel art and equally incredible music  one of the coolest platformers ive ever played
one of the best games ive ever played
the central mechanic hypercharge is so good it could carry the game by itself but luckily it doesnt have to incredible flow great platforming super tight design fantastic videogame
this game feels like it should be the reason to own a sega saturn a really fun and satisfyingtoplay 2d action platformer somewhat a sequel that never was for an era thats feeling longforgotten
an incredibly tight and satisfying action platformer just as the series needed for a while
ninja gaiden is back cant wait for ninja gaiden 4 very excellent game that ran very well on steam deck

i was honestly sad when i finished it about 8hrs to run thru not trying for any secrets or extra completion but theres hard mode after you beat it and if you beat that you can get the secret best ending  not sure if ill be doing all that but im happy with the amount of game thats available and would be a fun game to replay  i wish there was a game mode that lets you swap the playable characters at will or just reverses the current set up but who knows maybe in the future

this is a good game and its really fun the music is outstanding and its got a nice art style if youre looking for something for a retro theme arcade style game this is a good choice my only real negatives are that some parts of some levels feel kind of cheap also a few of the powers feel underwhelming with that said i still say go for it play it and have some fun   final grade b
best ninja game ever
they made a buddy cop ninja gaiden game
fuck awesome

pretty good the difficulty is normal but there is a hard modeopens after beating the game which will give you access to the third ending
awesome retro action platformer game
the game is pretty good i enjoyed the smooth slashing
i just want to double a to be away from the stupid life burdens
fun classic style game

love the art style and the story gameplay is good too but it can get frustrating sometimes theres just too many things happening on screen at the same time still enjoyed my time with it though i like this type of game better for ninja gaiden
the only thing about this game that will leave you ragebound is missing out on it this game is fast challenging addicting and above all else fun
definitely encapsulates the feel of the original titles while offering an updated interface nostalgic and high fun factor
most fun ive had all year
peak platforming
i need more of this
this is what i call a good game in 2025

good game for the price 15   the game is much easier than blasphemous and many levels are too easy to rush skipping most of the enemies level design is hit or miss  most of the items seem rather useless and i found the best ones very early in the game and i never replaced them  overall good experience playing on a handheld
the year of the ninja blesses us again

with my trust for the developer after blasphemous 1  2 i bought this game on release date its definitely very good bridge beetwen upcoming ninja gaiden 4 even though that is more of a platformer than slasher difficulty is solid combat is extremely satysfying characters well written and the gameplay is absolutely top not to mention great pixelart graphics which reminds me blasphemous game kitchen you guys did it great game case closed

i bought the game and love it  100 but it needs to be fixed a lot of frames drops and stuck screen and sounds problems using an rtx 3080 with latest drivers this should be impossible having these issues
an instant classic
awesome game
another awesome throwback game given a new twist of gameplay if you liked the old school ninja gaiden back on the nes youre  gonna love this updated creation
really solid action platformer would recommend to anybody who likes fast paced easy to play but tough to master action games
thank you game kitchen another masterpiece

a really solid throwback action platformer for sure gameplay was fun varied levels fast action upbeat 80sstyle guitar sound track  only thing is i wish theyd add a few iframes after you take touch damage
challenging game but at the same time fun and fair

great game expected of the developer of blasphmeous you get the retro feels when you play the game  more easy than the retro game but still hard challenging boss and  more importantly good control for me no comment for smooth movement the con for me is the short playtime  yeah because this is stage based game there is no need for extra exploration and backtracking  but the gameplay is good
amazing game very slick and fastpaced action along with wonderful banter between the two mains   kenji and kumori have great chemistry together and need to appear in future titles
amazing and polished game
the boss fights are full of cheese and shenanigans but the rest of the game is fun reminds me of the messenger
incredible game i only played the 3d games and wow is this good i hope they follow up on it or add new content because it is a blast
this is the most ninja gaiden ass game ive played since cyber shadow
great game great soundtrack can be a bit short if you skip secret missions or are not interested in hard mode but still well worth the price

very nice platformer challenging enough for every taste highly recomend this one  edit just a little note this game was developed by the guys who did blasphemous so like that game expect the tech here to be in the middle ages locked 60 fps and no ultrawide support funny enough the platforming here is miles better than blasphemous
great retro style side scroller  i grew up with the original ninja gaidens and this one is a great addition
great fun

its really fun and polished but the triple damage modifier in particular is necessary for the game to be sufficiently challenging  it was a really good idea to require the negative modifiers to get max rank for people who care

yeeeeeee it feels good it flows steady with the combat and collecting items on the level boss fights might seem spongy but your arts do some solid damage it feels fair overall this is a great game and im excited to play it on my deck
this game rules

now that ive finally completed ninja gaiden ragebound i can say it was a fastpaced and genuinely fun experience the action never lets up keeping you fully engaged from beginning to end the difficulty feels wellbalanced offering a solid challenge without becoming frustrating overall its a satisfying ride that delivers exactly what youd expect from a ninja gaiden title
snappy challenging replayable good soundtrack
fun game challenging bosses little short though i beat it in less than 5 hours some abilities are standout strong but nothing game breaking i hope the next one offers some core weapon variety
asdf
great game oldschool callback a bit short tho
i love that its level based and trying to get s or s  ranks demands you learn a stage thoroughly making you better at the game ost is top notch as well  time for hard mode
perfect

its pure plataforming with boss battles the controls feel really smooth and some mechanics such as trying to combine attacks to keep the hypercharge obligates you to build an strategy while dodging and slashing enemies even though this game makes it though to push its really satisfactory to speedrun a level or achieve a no hit run
this game is so fun its actually blasphemous that it isnt more popular
i wanna be ninja
2025 is year of ninja this is the 2nd game
this is a wonderful call back to the old school ninja gaiden games
yeah this is a banger the music the artstyle the game direction the story and even the character development is great game kitchen and dotemu really cooked with this one
great stider shinobi ninja gaiden

had a blast playing through this movement feels slick soundtrack is great and the animations and art style are gorgeous i dont think i couldve asked for more from this a lot of replay value in trying to srank this or beat it on hard difficulty as well i know a lot of people are put off by the relatively short length of this game but i feel like i could revisit this over and over again and have just as good of a time

awesome awesome fucking game and experience is has a ton of energy and heart i feel we havent seen in a very long time and it respects the series immensely its an excellent entry point to the series while also a blast for fans of it just the best
good action packed game fluid and responsive mouvements nice music and artstyle very challenging if you want to push the enveloppe with hard mode

its a nice callback to the nes era 2d ninja gaiden games i do feel like the level design for that latter chapters feels very different from the early chapters and im not referring to just the difficulty but more to the enemy placements and platform placements overall a fun game to play through
love the gameplay and artstyle super fun looking forward for more of ninja gaiden

very fun old school type game with some modern flair  great soundtrack excellent level design one of the best platform action games ive ever played  its published by the renowned dotemu so its stellar reputation holds up with this all time great game  highly recommend
its good

year of the ninja continues in full force this is an exceptional modern interpretation of the classic ninja gaiden games its just so much fun the art is breath takingly beautiful and everything is polished cant recommend this enough

why even bother with aaa games when the game kitchen is cooking kickass games like this and selling them for 20   absolutely precious pixel art obvious work from the creators of blasphemous excellent level design great challenge and cool protagonists music is fitting for the game and the story is simple enough it has that oldschool greatness  easy recommendation if you want a short sweet and highly replayeable game my spanish brothers have cooked again
absolute banger of a game with a killer soundtrack cannot believe ill be able to play peak 2d and 3d ninja gaiden   also portuguese pirates mentioned 1010
its really a fun ninja gaiden game its a hard one but i did enjoy the music  the gameplay is like strider but so much fun
i havent played a game this exciting in a long time please make a sequal where kumori is the main playable character
its a solid fun time even if it wont take some people long its worth the ride
the combat is one of the most satisfying and feelgood mechanics i have seen silky smooth and each level is just such joy to play really wish it was longer highly recommend it
dang i do love this game i dont know why i do know that it helps with hdhd
well what can i say they did a great job with this one

decent little story that doesnt take itself super seriously if you like ninja gaiden youll love it resounding similarity to blasphemous their previous work but it definitely sets itself apart with its breakneck pace
wicked good game  takes plays during the events of the original but as different members of the hayabusa clan  wicked good
good game

some of the finest 2d action ive ever played up there with curse of the moon and shinobi 3 and the like it is among those retro or retrostyled games that have reached greatness if you love 2d action games please give this a look the game is decently difficult its not insulting to the players skills but its not some secret torture method used by the cia like the usa version of ninja gaiden 3   i hope more games like this come out soon
i started this up and suddenly it was 1990 and my mom was yelling at me to to turn that thing off and come to dinner

awesome game

fun
very well made game a times very fun but also at times very annoying game requires patienceif you can give the game patience and grace you will love it
super cool dirt bike level my favorite i love to chop my enemies in half

came here to echo what everyone else is saying game is fun and fast
game is lots of fun love the classic ost remixes and the gameplay is nice and engaging totally recommend

great game you dont stop moving forward with the flow of the game once the gameplay clicks it has great pacing great boss fights and mechanics the ost is amazing unfortunately the game is short and time passes by really fast playing it i wish kumori had more screen time as a playable main character and also wanted better options for the vhs filter filter without the screen distortion
this is classic ninja gaiden with a modern spin what more can you ask for either get good or dont play simple as that
great game and replay mechanics really loving the game already

havent completed it yet but its so far awesome it plays like a nice arcade game and has throwbackseaster eggs to the nes games its super polished and has one hell of a lot of replay value worth 20 bucks in my opinion  edit after completing game and going back for 100 percent the game is indeed awesome
this game is so fun i havent even beaten it yet but as an 80s baby i grew up with ninja gaiden and they havent made one that isnt action packed and stylized cool fluid and fun to play
